name: Charming Flight
description: In the beautiful charming  forest, everyone lived in peace and harmony, until bad mushrooms appeared in it. These mushrooms were very evil and insidious, many inhabitants of the forest suffered because of them. The fairy decided to clear the planet of these heathens once and for all. Embark on an exciting duel with mushrooms and defeat them! Collect magical coins and crystals, they give you strength and power. And also do not forget about lilies - they have a unique property of destroying all evil. Have a good and successful flight!
